content:
I am a senior year undergrad at IIT Kanpur, majoring in Electrical Engineering. My interests vary from application of Math and Artificial Intelligence in real world pproblems including robotics and audio (read music) technology, to solving algorithmic problems for fun. I am currently working with Prof. Vipul Arora in Music Information Retrieval, and am a part of institute IGVC team. I have previously interned at Adobe BEL labs where I worked with Reinforcement Learning and User behaviour modelling.
Apart from my academic pursuits, I enjoy creating and covering music (Jazz) through all sorts of instruments, and playing football for fun and lawn tennis for school. I’ve recently discovered the joy of competitive programming. #Nelson Bighetti is a professor of artificial intelligence at the Stanford AI Lab. His research interests include distributed robotics, mobile computing and programmable matter. He leads the Robotic Neurobiology group, which develops self-reconfiguring robots, systems of self-organizing robots, and mobile sensor networks.

title: Rohin Garg
